Text: my addressPST Hi Thanks for the note It was great to hear from you and to know that all of the BS down there is not really effecting you and your fun My new address is Donna Ackert McPherson Road WHITEHORSE YT YA S Phone You do not have to worrie about sending me a cheque It is not a big deal Just take yourselves out for a nice dinner or whatever and have a drink for me while your at it I just appreciate you looking after my Daultons for me while you could Work is coming along We are in the process of putting product on the shelves What a mess everything is in We have days before opening and if we make it I will be surprised Lack of any sence of organization is a big problem All I can say is I am glad that I am just a flunkie because if I owned the place Heads would roll The old bod keeps forgetting that it is six years older than it was in Summerland and just cant figure out why it is so pooped at the end of the day I really dont know how I managed days a week for weeks on end GETTING OLD IS NO FUN AT ALL Well best get for now Love to both you and Beth Donna Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals

working againPST Hi Thought I would drop you a quick note I do not know if your mom told you but I went back to work just over a week ago WalMart is opening a new store here so I applied and got a job We are in the process of setting up the store shelves etc plus stocking them Lots of work but I have a good partner to work with It took us about three days to find eachother but we work well together and make sure we head for the same area each day Winter is here We have about inches of snow so far It is only about so not cold at all Not much news other than going back to work so will run for now Drop me a line and let me know how all of the mess in New York has been effecting you Say hi to Beth for me as well Lots of Love Donna Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals

PST Hi Glad to hear that things are moving along for you Believe me I know what waiting to sell a house is like It is nice to have ones own place but a pain in the butt when you are trying to move Anyway GOOD LUCK and drop me a note from time to time Love Donna Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

how are things goingPST Hi Jon Just a quick note to see how you are making out selling your house I hope things are going well Got a note from your mom and sounds like your dads party went well Drop me a line when you have time Love Donna Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

PST Jon Sorry for the delay in getting back to you I talked to your mom last night and we talked about the stuff you have that is mine She was going to call you but if she did not reach you here goes I paid either or for the three piece unit I really do not care what you sell them for just get rid of them the best you can Sell cheep and get them out of your way Carol will look after the dolls and she will also keep the mirror for me as she has the table She told me that the mirror is broken but she will keep the frame for me which is great How are things going Have you had people in to look at the house yet Keep me posted Oh yes when you move back to Houston can I still reach you at this email address If not make sure to drop me a line with a new address so we can keep in touch Is this going to be another promotion for you or is it a lateril transfer Whatever I wish you luck Wont keep you any longer as it is late and past my bedtime Talk to you later Donna Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

my junkPST Hi Jon Just read your message Sounds like you are going to be very busy for the next while Your house will probably sell very fast as it is in a great area and it is a nice place You can just sell the cabinets of mine if you want I dont have room for them and neither does your mum or if you want just take them with you if you want them I just dropped a note to your mum to ask her to keep the mirror for me as she has the table and I am sure she will keep the Daultons if you do not want to take them with you I know you may not as they are a pain in the but to haul arround with you If you talk to Steve and he wants the TV cabinte he is welcome to have it but if he can not use if again just sell it when you start selling off your stuff My new phone is I am going away tomorrow morning and will be gone until Sunday evening Rons mum is here and I am taking her on a little tour Anyway we can talk about this more next week if that is ok with you Drop me a note and let me know Lots of Love Donna Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

long time no talkPST Hi Jon Thought I would drop you a note to see how you are doing I havent heard from you for ages and was wondering what you are up to If Beth is down for Stampeed say Hi to her for me We are slowly getting things sorted out and under control around here We have all of the major inside projects done and Ron is just about finished putting up the fence This is good as they have just posted a caution bear in the area sign on the mailboxes The fence should keep them away from the house I hope I sent pictures of the place to your mum so reminde her to show them to you the next time you see her I really like the place Lots of work to keep me busy and out of trouble but not as much work as the house and yard in Calgary Rons mum coming for a visit on July Will take her out and about in the Yukon and a couple of places in Alaska I am looking forward to going on a tour again Well should run for now All is well with me Going to the gym days a week and am working on quitting smoking again Lots of Love Donna Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail
